name: Column
description: Column is a helper component for DataTable and TreeTable.

properties.name: align
properties.description: Aligns the content of the column, valid values are left, right and center.

properties.name: alignFrozen
properties.description: Position of a frozen column, valid values are left and right.

properties.name: alignHeader
properties.description: Aligns the header of the column, valid values are left, right and center.

properties.name: body
properties.description: Body content of the column.

properties.name: bodyClassName
properties.description: Style class of the body. If using a function must return a string.

properties.name: bodyStyle
properties.description: Inline style of the body.

properties.name: cellEditValidateOnClose
properties.description:
When enabled and cellEditorValidator is set, force to call cellEditorValidator
before cell editor is closed. If cellEditorValidator returns false, editor stays open.

properties.name: cellEditValidatorEvent
properties.description: Event to trigger the validation, possible values are "click" and "blur".

properties.name: children
properties.description: Used to get the child elements of the component.

properties.name: className
properties.description: Style class of the component.

properties.name: colSpan
properties.description: Number of columns to span for grouping.

properties.name: columnKey
properties.description: Identifier of a column if field property is not defined. Only utilized by reorderableColumns feature at the moment.

properties.name: dataType
properties.description: Depending on the dataType of the column, suitable match modes are displayed.

properties.name: editor
properties.description: Function to provide the cell editor input.

properties.name: excludeGlobalFilter
properties.description: Whether to exclude from global filtering or not.

properties.name: expander
properties.description: Displays an icon to toggle row expansion.

properties.name: exportable
properties.description: Defines whether the column is exported or not.

properties.name: exportField
properties.description: Property of a row data used for exporting, defaults to field.

properties.name: exportHeader
properties.description: Custom export header of the column to be exported.

properties.name: field
properties.description: Property of a row data.

properties.name: filter
properties.description: Defines if a column can be filtered.

properties.name: filterApply
properties.description: Template of apply element in menu.

properties.name: filterClear
properties.description: Template of clear element in menu.

properties.name: filterElement
properties.description: Element for custom filtering.

properties.name: filterField
properties.description: Property of a row data used for filtering, defaults to field.

properties.name: filterFooter
properties.description: Template of footer element in menu.

properties.name: filterHeader
properties.description: Template of header element in menu.

properties.name: filterHeaderClassName
properties.description: Style class of the filter header.

properties.name: filterHeaderStyle
properties.description: Inline style of the filter header.

properties.name: filterMatchMode
properties.description: Defines filterMatchMode; "startsWith", "contains", "endsWith", "equals", "notEquals", "in", "notIn", "lt", "lte", "gt", "gte" and "custom".

properties.name: filterMatchModeOptions
properties.description: An array of label-value pairs to override the global match mode options.

properties.name: filterMaxLength
properties.description: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the filter element.

properties.name: filterMenuClassName
properties.description: Style class of the column filter overlay.

properties.name: filterMenuStyle
properties.description: Inline style of the column filter overlay.

properties.name: filterPlaceholder
properties.description: Defines placeholder of the input fields.

properties.name: filterType
properties.description: Type of the filter input field.

properties.name: footer
properties.description: Footer content of the table.

properties.name: footerClassName
properties.description: Style class of the footer.

properties.name: footerStyle
properties.description: Inline style of the footer.

properties.name: frozen
properties.description: Whether the column is fixed in horizontal scrolling or not.

properties.name: header
properties.description: Header content of the table.

properties.name: headerClassName
properties.description: Style class of the header.

properties.name: headerStyle
properties.description: Inline style of the header.

properties.name: headerTooltip
properties.description: Content of the header tooltip.

properties.name: headerTooltipOptions
properties.description: Configuration of the header tooltip, refer to the tooltip documentation for more information.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: Whether the column is rendered.

properties.name: maxConstraints
properties.description: Maximum number of constraints for a column filter.

properties.name: pt
properties.description: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

properties.name: ptOptions
properties.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

properties.name: reorderable
properties.description: Used to defined reorderableColumns per column when reorderableColumns of table is enabled, defaults to value of reorderableColumns.

properties.name: resizeable
properties.description: Used to defined resizeableColumns per column when resizeableColumns of table is enabled, defaults to value of resizeableColumns.

properties.name: rowEditor
properties.description: Displays icons to edit row.

properties.name: rowReorder
properties.description: Whether this column displays an icon to reorder the rows.

properties.name: rowReorderIcon
properties.description: Icon of the drag handle to reorder rows.

properties.name: rowSpan
properties.description: Number of rows to span for grouping.

properties.name: selectionMode
properties.description: Specifies the selection mode, valid values are "single", "multiple", "radiobutton" and "checkbox".

properties.name: showAddButton
properties.description: When enabled, a button is displayed to add more rules.

properties.name: showApplyButton
properties.description: Displays a button to apply the column filtering.

properties.name: showClearButton
properties.description: Displays a button to clear the column filtering.

properties.name: showFilterMatchModes
properties.description: Whether to show the match modes selector.

properties.name: showFilterMenu
properties.description: Whether to display the filter overlay.

properties.name: showFilterMenuOptions
properties.description: Whether to show the match modes selector and match operator selector.

properties.name: showFilterOperator
properties.description: When enabled, match all and match any operator selector is displayed.

properties.name: sortable
properties.description: Defines if a column is sortable.

properties.name: sortableDisabled
properties.description: When enabled, the data of columns with this property cannot be sorted or changed by the user.

properties.name: sortField
properties.description: Name of the field to sort data by default.

properties.name: style
properties.description: Inline style of the component.

properties.name: unstyled
properties.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

callbacks.name: cellEditValidator
callbacks.description: Validator function to validate the cell input value.

callbacks.name: onBeforeCellEditHide
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke before the cell editor is hidden.

callbacks.name: onBeforeCellEditShow
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke before the cell editor is shown. To prevent editor from showing return false or originalEvent.preventDefault().

callbacks.name: onCellEditCancel
callbacks.description: Callback to execute when editor is cancelled.

callbacks.name: onCellEditComplete
callbacks.description: Callback to execute when editor is submitted.

callbacks.name: onCellEditInit
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when cell edit is initiated. To prevent editor from showing return false or originalEvent.preventDefault().

callbacks.name: onFilterApplyClick
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when the apply button is clicked.

callbacks.name: onFilterClear
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when the filter meta is cleared.

callbacks.name: onFilterConstraintAdd
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a new constraint is added.

callbacks.name: onFilterConstraintRemove
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a constraint is removed.

callbacks.name: onFilterMatchModeChange
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when the match mode option is changed.

callbacks.name: onFilterOperatorChange
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when the filter operator option is changed.
